page.title: 18FOOD EATEN IN BLACKBURN
page.content: Some examples of our food today are chips, baked beans and curry and rice. Chips are made with potatoes. We peel them, cut them up into strips and put them in fat until they are a light brown colour. Baked beans are in a tomato sauce, they can be eaten with anything, especially chips and beefburgers. Curry and rice is a hot, spicy meal. Rice is a small, white, oval shape. Curry is a spicy liquid with meat and kidney beans in it. We have places where you can go out for a meal or a soft drink, such as cafes and burger houses. In these places you can buy beefburgers, hamburgers and chips. The burger houses have different names, such as MacDonalds and Big Boy.
